Survive the Rift. Defend the World. Together.

RiftHunt is a fast-paced online co-op action roguelike where players fight back an invasion from a dark parallel dimension. Dimensional rifts tear open across the map, spawning relentless enemies that threaten both players and critical structures.

Team up with friends, choose your class, and survive as long as you can.
